testCase.name: Service: Book should ...

BookListComponent should have p tag with the book.editorial.name

BookDetailComponent should have one dd tag for component.bookDetail.description

BookCreateComponent should have an input with id isbn and with formControlName isbn
BookCreateComponent should have an input with id description and with formControlName description
BookCreateComponent should have a select with id authors and with formControlName authors
